Title: Exempts certain paratransit eligible individuals from recertification requirements
Summary: Allows for paratransit eligible for paratransit eligible individuals who are at least eighty years old, to be required only to present correspondence from a licensed physician, dated within the preceding thirty days, indicating that the paratransit service is still necessary for the individual to make a single application for paratransit services; provides that once approved, such individuals shall be exempt from all certification requirements.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to special powers of the metropolitan transportation authority
